doc.title: 1000 millones
doc.plot: Julian Vargas is a person very humid and a little vulgar, loves women and very caring for his friends. He is separated and lives in the Boca neighbor hood with his adopted mother and his brother. He has an aunt and a cousin a little slow and friend, Luis. He is a workman in the dry dock of Tigre. This way he earns his living and does not have high expectations of life. Does not study, left high school in the third year and lives his life and seducing women. Carolina Marin is a neighbor of Julian and his friend since they where very young. Carolina is a student in the university and she is left only one year to graduate and receive her diploma as an accountant. She is an example, very beautiful, good very hard learning loves her father and lives for him. The real father of Julian, a very powerful business man, is very ill and on his dieting bad he had decided to leave his in heritage, his huge fortune, to his son that he had never known: all his businesses is 1 billion. For this he heirs a lower to take care of everything. The family of the father of Julián does not know that Julian exists and they are sure that all the in heritage of the 1 billion will go to them. Pilar Arias is a very unparticular girl of 28 years old, she had a very reach and good life, only that her father, a hardhearted player that she didn't see for a long time, he had left her and her mother in the street, this is why they had emigrated to Brazil, went through lots of privations. Pilar returns to Buenos Aires ready for to gain at any cost the place that they had lost long ago.

Julian Vargas is a person very humid and a little vulgar, loves women and very caring for his friends. He is separated and lives in the Boca neighbor hood with his adopted mother and his brother. He has an aunt and a cousin a little slow and friend, Luis. He is a workman in the dry dock of Tigre. This way he earns his living and does not have high expectations of life. Does not study, left high school in the third year and lives his life and seducing women. Carolina Marin is a neighbor of Julian and his friend since they where very young. Carolina is a student in the university and she is left only one year to graduate and receive her diploma as an accountant. She is an example, very beautiful, good very hard learning loves her father and lives for him. The real father of Julian, a very powerful business man, is very ill and on his dieting bad he had decided to leave his in heritage, his huge fortune, to his son that he had never known: all his businesses is 1 billion. For this he heirs a lower to take care of everything. The family of the father of Julián does not know that Julian exists and they are sure that all the in heritage of the 1 billion will go to them. Pilar Arias is a very unparticular girl of 28 years old, she had a very reach and good life, only that her father, a hardhearted player that she didn't see for a long time, he had left her and her mother in the street, this is why they had emigrated to Brazil, went through lots of privations. Pilar returns to Buenos Aires ready for to gain at any cost the place that they had lost long ago.
